DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effectiveness of RXI-109 in reducing the recurrence of hypertrophic scar formation following elective revision of a pre-existing hypertrophic scar.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Effectiveness and Safety of RXI 109 on the Outcome of Revised Hypertrophic Scars
DOC.criteria: Adults, 2155 years of age General good health Previous surgery or injury resulting in a hypertrophic scar Scars on the face or front of neck may not be included in the trial Use of tobacco or nicotinecontaining products Pregnant or lactating
